entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
